name: Brahmastra
shortDescription: The Divine Missile of Brahma - Weapon of Cosmic Destruction
fullDescription:
The Divine Missile of Brahma - Weapon of Cosmic Destruction The Brahmastra (Sanskrit: "Weapon of Brahma") is among the most frequently referenced
                    divine weapons in Hindu epic literature, appearing prominently in both the Ramayana and
                    Mahabharata. Created by Lord Brahma, the god of creation, this astra represents the
                    paradox of creative power turned to destruction - the force that brings forth the universe
                    concentrated into a weapon capable of unmaking it.
